content:
Rosenthal family

1 Izrael ROSENTHAL                   1771 - before 1829 (Selig) {census family 596}
 + Chai                              1775 (Jozef)
  2x Aron ROSENTHAL                  1790
  2x Lebel ROSENTHAL                 1792
  2x Juda ROSENTHAL                  1794-96 - 1832 #131
    + Mariam BASCHELS                1801
          married Feb 16, 1820 #8

       * Noach Eliasz FISCHLOWICZ CYMZER  1821 #205

                   banns Prog.Syn 1904 #134

             * Abraham Szloma LESZMAN  Chmielnik
                   married 1919 #39
        4o Regina ROSENTHAL          1868 #673

    + Franciska BROCKMAN
